== Sakalbena (603326) ==
      
Sakalbena is a village in the [[Ankola ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1813.85 hectares and harbouring 626 households with total population of 2606 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[ANKOLA]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 1354 and female population is 1252. Scheduled Caste Population is 127 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the village is 603326<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
